name: I Never Said It Was a Good Taste (Demo)
name_original: I Never Said It Was a Good Taste (Demo)
description: A prototype level for a game made during Ludum Dare 33. Play a horrifying space cutie infiltrating a nuclear power plant for it's delicious, delicious, plutonium core. Advance levels by hijacking the body of a scientist and using their key card to open elevators leading down to the reactor.
